name: Tritus
overview: A three person Tetris game. Amiga User International said it was the best game of its genre. Each player has a well in which to drop various shapes. The aim is to completely fill a horizontal row of blocks, which will then disappear, leaving space in the well. Completed rows effect other players, with single rows pushing others up, doubles producing green slimers, triples will releases assorted tricks and quads are especially nasty. Tritus was first released a few years ago as shareware. Thank you to all who registered! Now we've decided that you can have this full version for free. Play competitively against computers or humans in this game with super smooth control and animation. Your actions affect the other players. Amiga User International said it was the best game of its genre.
